## Checklist
- [ ] `cargo fmt --all -- --check`
- [ ] `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets -- -D warnings`
- [ ] `cargo test --workspace`
- [ ] `cargo doc --workspace --no-deps`
- [ ] Added/updated docs or ADR if architecture changed
- [ ] Added/updated tests for behavior changes
